attributes.action: Cease any and all statements of regret regarding Britians role in the slave trade
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We reject that we are in anyway responsible for actions, that, whilst we would all agree to be heinous and evil to our eyes, were the actions of 2 centuries ago.

We instead suggest that the Prime Minister emphasize the role played by the British Empire in stamping out slavery! After slavery was outlawed throughout the Empire, the full might and resources of the Royal Navy was deployed to wipe out the slave trade in all British dominions and all British-controlled waters. the collapse of slavery throughout the world is in no small part due to the policies of the British Empire. We petition the Prime Minister to give his own country some kudos for that 

As far as we are concerned, slavery is something that happened hundreds of years ago and something for which our country long ago made amends.
